title: Monkeysky's Author Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Hi, I'm Monkeysky (AKA Schuyler, Sky or September). I'm a neurobiologist. 

As of now, I have written a few SCPs and non-SCP articles, and haven't added much information since I first realized I should make an author page. Feel free to leave a comment if there's something you'd like explained or talked about.

More of my stuff can be found at [https://september-xyzx.neocities.org/ my personal site].

[[module ListPages created_by="monkeysky" order="commented on desc" separate="no" tags="scp" perPage="250" prependLine="||~ SCP Number ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||~ Created ||~ Commented On ||"]] 
|| %%title_linked%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%% || %%created_at|%D%% || %%commented_at|%D%% ||
[[/module]]

[[module ListPages created_by="monkeysky" order="commented on desc" separate="no" tags="-scp" perPage="250" prependLine="||~ Title ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||~ Created ||~ Commented On ||"]] 
|| %%title_linked%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%% || %%created_at|%D%% || %%commented_at|%D%% ||
[[/module]]

Fun Facts:

* I once found a forum posts stating that someone had been roleplaying as [[[SCP-1163]]] on a Gary's Mod server. I have never been able to find more information about this.
* My friend Ratking made [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:ratking666-s-art-exchange-gift-2022 this awesome artwork of 1163] for the 2022 secret santa gift exchange.
* I am the actual owner and creator of the stuffed animal photographed in [[[SCP-7071]]], but it isn't actually named Wiggly.

author: Monkeysky
